shoulderDart.d: Whether or not to inlude a dart at the shoulder to round the back
shoulderDartSize.d: The size of the shoulder dart
shoulderDartLength.d: The length of the shoulder dart
waistDart.d: Whether or not to inlude a dart at the waist to round the back
waistDartSize.d: The size of the waist dart
waistDartLength.d: The length of the waist dart
verticalEase.d: The amount of ease to distribute along the length of the garment
waistEase.d: The amount of ease at the waist
primaryBustDart.d: Where to place the bust dart to shape the chest
primaryBustDartLength.d: The length of the bust dart
secondaryBustDart.d: Optionally include a secondary bust dart to distribute the shaping of the chest
secondaryBustDartLength.d: The length of the secondary bust dart
primaryBustDartShaping.d: Controls the balance between the main and secondary bust darts
